name: Red Pill VS Blue Pill
description: You can play as the red pill or the blue pill. You have to get a score better than the opponent to win. Red Pill controls are: W-Up, S-Down, A-Rotate Left, D-Rotate Right, & F-Shoot. Blue Pill controls are: Up Arrow-Up, Down Arrow-Down, Left Arrow-Rotate Left, Right Arrow-Rotate Right, & /-Shoot. Be careful to try to not hit the mines in the middle of the map or else it will add points to the opponents score.
